cause.description:
This cause's donations go to AIESEC US, to make donations to AIESEC International go to http://www.aiesec.net/alumni/donate/view-initiative?initiative_id=43156278 and to donate to various other AIESEC initiatives around the world go to http://www.aiesec.net/alumni/donate/search-initiative
AIESEC, the world's largest student organization, is the international platform for young people to discover and develop their potential so as to have a positive impact on society.
In addition to providing over 5,000 leadership positions and delivering over 350 conferences to our membership of over 22,000 students , AIESEC also runs an exchange program that enables over 4,000 students and recent graduates the opportunity to live and work in another country .
1. Internationally AIESEC envisions "Peace and Fulfilment of Humankind’s Potential"
2. Developing individuals, cooperation and communities
cause.mission: To contribute to the development of our countries and their people with an overriding commitment to international understanding and cooperation.
cause.name: AIESEC United States
